description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Get into christmas mood and check out this Match 3 game. Beautiful backgrounds, christmas trees, jingle bells and twenty challenging levels - it's all there.
description.short: Get into christmas mood and check out this Match 3 game. Beautiful backgrounds, christmas trees, jingle bells and twenty challenging levels - it's all there.
